/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling intersection in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The intersection is teeming with life, with cars and buses navigating their way through the roads. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the streets, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the setting sun. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun setting in the distance, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, golden light.
